title: Weekend Wanders: A Slow Walk Through Cincinnati
summary: A camera roll, a coffee map, and small observations from a quiet Saturday.

blocks.text: I mapped a gentle loop through the city with stops for coffee, window shopping, and a long pause on the riverfront.
The riverfront always feels like a deep breath.
The best moments were the smallest ones: a sunlit alley, a mural in OTR, and the way the breeze changes near the water.
